column5: Continue your professional development in health and social care towards advanced or specialist roles.Course summaryStudy modules in clinical skills, professional development, research, service development, education and leadership and management.Gain awards credit towards a postgraduate certificate, postgraduate diploma or masters in Advanced Professional Development.Develop your professional practice, building on expertise you already possess.Continuing professional development is a key requirement of health and social care professionals. This flexible course allows you to tailor your studies according to your own development needs, helping you to progress to more advanced or specialist roles.
column7: For part-time study the fee will be calculated pro-rata each year based on the number of credits studied (£830 for 15 credits or £1,655 for 30 credits)  Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
